* Iron Raptor nodded at Tavatron�s answer to her transmission and then looked down at the wolf as she came outside and stood beside her, no time to loose at all. She had heard Bronco�s transmission and knew that NOW was the time to act. She couldn�t wait for Striker or any others, she had to go NOW.
With a growl and a short nod to Tavtron she then began to run towards the position where Bronco was, the life of Octociz in her hands. But what worried her was that if she gave him the comp she would not be able to get the other bot back. How could she be garonteed that he would o what he said and hand him over to her?
That was the problem�she had no garontee�just her gut instincts.
Iron Raptor ran as quickly as her legs would permit, having less then a mega-cycle to get there, there was no time to waste!
It wasn�t long until the cliff came into sight and so did Bronco, she slowed to a jog as she then came up to the enemy in question.
She glared at him for a min before she looked around for Octociz�s shell, she wanted him alive�but she needed him whole as well.
Iron Raptor looked back at Bronco for a moment and then gave a silent command to transform. Now in her robot mode she reached into her leg compartment and took out the computer.
She looked at Bronco.*

� Well, here it is. The comp that you asked for. No strings, nothing.�

*She then looked at the comp but then kept it in her hand, tighening the grip on it.*

� But I need Octociz�s spark first. There�s no bot here other then me so there�s no reason why you shouldn�t.�

* She waited for Bronco�s reply.*
